name: ATV Offroad Racing
description:
ATV Offroad Racing

I bring to your attention to a new solo developed indie-game "ATV Offroad Racing".

You will meet on your way hard turns, downhill runs and steep uphill. Don’t let you outrun! Show who's in charge on the track for a strong quad bikes.

Win in four different types of contests. Your opponents will play hard. They will try to kick you out from the track when they will be near you. You can do the same — winning's all that matters!

Realistic 3D graphic gives you even more vivid sensation from high-speed game. Prove that you are number one and nobody can leave you behind. There is no place for compromise!

It is available as "free" on a third party gaming portal, but contains ads.
Here, for a nominal fee (at your discretion), you are offered the full version without ads.

Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10

Just unzip to your game folder and play!
